text: Juliette Binoche (born 9 March 1964) is a French actress. She was born in Paris. Her maternal grandparents were Poles. She won an Academy Award for her role in the movie Chocolat. She won a BAFTA Award for her role as Hana in The English Patient. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:French Academy Award winning actors Category:Actors from Paris Category:BAFTA Award winning actors Category:French movie actors Category:1964 births Category:Living people
title: Juliette Binoche
